import {useState, useEffect} from 'react' import './MoneySimulator.css' const MoneySimulator = ({moneyNow}) => { const [simulator ,setSimulator] = useState(1) const [inputValue,setInputValue] = useState(1000) const wise = {title:'Wise', taxa:1.2, others:false, img:'https://www.finder.com/niche-builder/604174075a35c.png'} const remessa = {title:'Remessa Online', taxa:1.2, others:10, img:'https://lulufive.com.br/wp-content/uploads/parceiro-remessa-online-1.png'} const paypal = {title:'PayPal', taxa:1.2, others:10, img:'https://pngimg.com/uploads/paypal/paypal_PNG22.png'} let calc = '' function converter(){ if(moneyNow !== undefined){ if(simulator == 1){ calc = (inputValue / moneyNow).toFixed(2) } else{ calc = (inputValue * moneyNow).toFixed(2) } } } converter() return (
Selecione o modo
Valor

Taxa = {wise.taxa}

{calc-(calc)/wise.taxa}

Total

{(calc)/wise.taxa}

Taxa = {remessa.taxa}

{calc-(calc)/remessa.taxa}

Total

{(calc)/remessa.taxa}

Taxa = 1.3

{calc-(calc)/paypal.taxa}

Total

{(calc)/paypal.taxa}

) } export default MoneySimulator
